languages.text: Wielder gains a +5% chance to reduce incoming {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} by half for each point of {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The wearer gains a +5% chance to ignore {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effects{/g} from enemy psychic powers for each point of {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and a +5% chance to reduce incoming {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} by half for each point of deflection.

Wielder gains a +5% chance to reduce incoming {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} by half for each point of {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

languages.text: 装备者每有1点{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，就有5%的几率使承受的{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}减半。
languages.original_text: Wielder gains a +5% chance to reduce incoming {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} by half for each point of {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 装备者每有1点{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，就有5%的几率使承受的{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}减半。

languages.text: Персонаж получает +5% к шансу уменьшить получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g} вдвое за каждую единицу {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g}.
languages.original_text: Wielder gains a +5% chance to reduce incoming {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} by half for each point of {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Каждая единица {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} дает +5% к шансу игнорировать {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффекты{/g} психосил противника и +5% к шансу уменьшить получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g} вдвое.

Каждая единица {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g} дает +5% к шансу игнорировать {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффекты{/g} психосил противника и +5% к шансу уменьшить получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урон{/g} вдвое.

languages.text: 使用者は5%の確率で{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}ポイント1ごとに、受ける{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}歪みダメージ{/g}が半減する。
languages.original_text: Wielder gains a +5% chance to reduce incoming {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} by half for each point of {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者は5％の確率で敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}のポイントごとに{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}の効果を無視し、5％の確率でディフレクションのポイントごとに受ける{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}を半減する。

languages.text: El portador consigue una probabilidad del +5 % de reducir el {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} que recibe a la mitad por cada punto de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}.
languages.original_text: Wielder gains a +5% chance to reduce incoming {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} by half for each point of {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El portador consigue una probabilidad del +5 % de ignorar los efectos de los {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g} de los enemigos por cada punto de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} y una probabilidad del +5 % de reducir el {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} que reciba a la mitad por cada punto de desvío.

languages.text: Der Träger erhält für jeden Punkt {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} eine Chance von +5 %, erlittenen {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} zu halbieren.
languages.original_text: Wielder gains a +5% chance to reduce incoming {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} by half for each point of {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erhält eine Chance von +5 % auf das Ignorieren der Effekte feindlicher {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionischer Kräfte{/g} für jeden Punkt {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} und eine Chance von +5 % auf das Reduzieren eingehenden {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schadens{/g} um die Hälfte für jeden Punkt Deflektion.

languages.text: L'utilisateur bénéficie de +5 % de chances par point de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de réduire de moitié les {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g} qui lui sont infligés.
languages.original_text: Wielder gains a +5% chance to reduce incoming {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} by half for each point of {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Pour chaque point de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}, l'utilisateur bénéficie de +5 % de chances d'ignorer les effets des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} ennemis, et de +5 % de chances de réduire de moitié les {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts warp{/g} subis.

Pour chaque point de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}, l'utilisateur bénéficie de +5 % de chances d'ignorer les effets des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} ennemis, et de +5 % de chances de réduire de moitié les {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts warp{/g} subis.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi, sahip olduğu her {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} puanı ile, gelen {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarını{/g} +%5 oranla yarıya indirme olasılığı kazanır.
languages.original_text: Wielder gains a +5% chance to reduce incoming {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} by half for each point of {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
